Name: Raised Access Floor, non seismically rated.

GeneralInformation.Description: Access floor unanchored or anchored with adhesive.  Costing is based upon a xxx SF floor area.
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given
GeneralInformation.Notes: Consequence Note:  Some downtime for repair of floor and equipment.

DamageStates.Description: Minor damage to the flooring system.  Damage to the equipment of the flooring system.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Repair the flooring system, assume cost equal to 5% of the replacement cost.  Repair the flooring equipment, assume a cost equal to 10% of the replacement cost.
